definition: to fall short of/not as good as/too late
there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
impatient (idiom); in a hurry/itching to get on with it
no time to deal with it (idiom); caught unprepared
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: to be caught off guard/without warning
too far is as bad as not enough (idiom, from the Analects)
not enough time (to do sth)/too late (to do sth)

sentences.english: I can't wait to take a bite of the pumpernickel.
sentences.chinese: 我简直迫不及待想吃一口黑包。

sentences.english: The rampant and absurd behavior that prince 2 for people unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 这猖獗而荒唐的行为叫马王二人一时措手不及。

sentences.english: Theres a reason people cant wait for Christmas, and it haslittle to do with family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 人们等不及过圣诞节的理由和家人团聚没有任何关系。

sentences.english: It's too late to change it now. What's done is done.
sentences.chinese: 现在再改变已经来不及了，木已成舟。

sentences.english: The mother licked the child for failing the examination.
sentences.chinese: 母亲因孩子考试不及格而打了他。

sentences.english: Napoleon planned to strike a quick blow at his old enemy.
sentences.chinese: 拿破伦策划对他的宿敌实施迅雷不及掩耳的打击。

sentences.english: But too much of a good thing isn't the only problem with contact management programs today.
sentences.chinese: 过犹不及不仅仅只是目前联系人管理程序的唯一问题。

sentences.english: Hatred does not stir the stone men half so much as hunger.
sentences.chinese: 憎恶不及饥饿一半的可能扰动石人。

sentences.english: When it comes to sex, non-human animals are way more experimental than us.
sentences.chinese: 说到性，动物远不及人类有实验精神。

sentences.english: Fascinated, my eyes reverting from the south, dropt, to follow those.
sentences.chinese: 令人着迷，目转南方答之不及，低，那些落叶。

sentences.english: Some go even further to beat the heat, rolling up their pants legs.
sentences.chinese: 有些人为了祛暑甚至过而无不及，竟卷起裤腿来。

sentences.english: The Baleh river is far less wide than it is long.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒河的宽度远不及它的长度。

sentences.english: Look at what you are doing now. You are much worse than your father.
sentences.chinese: 看你现在做的呢，有过之而无不及。

sentences.english: The manufacturers in Mainland China are eager to adopt the products of Media Tek and MStar Semiconductor.
sentences.chinese: 而中国厂家则迫不及待地投入联发科和晨星的怀抱。

sentences.english: In school teach him it is far more honourable to fail than to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 教他求学时不及格比作弊来得刚正。

sentences.english: When I saw the blue, I can not wait into the embrace of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 当看到那片蔚蓝色时，我迫不及待地投入到它的怀抱。

definition: there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
can't keep up with/can't catch up with/cannot overtake
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
there's still time/able to do sth in time
to emerge (from a comparison)/to come out as/to be competent or equal to
to be caught off guard/without warning
